trans-unit.source: An activity that supports compensation of its child activities.
trans-unit.target: Uma atividade que dá suporte à compensação das atividades filho dela.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> allows a developer to specify a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> activity that defines a long-running task that performs their core business logic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> permite que um desenvolvedor especificar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> atividade que define uma tarefa demorada que executa sua principal lógica de negócios.

trans-unit.source: It also allows the developer to optionally specify a compensation and confirmation activity to schedule appropriate business logic in the event of errors or successful completion of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ele também permite que o desenvolvedor especificar opcionalmente uma atividade de compensação e a confirmação para agendar a lógica de negócios adequada no caso de erros ou a conclusão bem-sucedida de <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Compensation and confirmation of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> is invoked by using the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> returned by the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Compensação e a confirmação de uma <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> é chamado por meio de <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> retornado pelo <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is an opaque, typed object returned after successful completion of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activity’s <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> é um objeto opaco, com tipo retornado após a conclusão bem-sucedida de um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> da atividade <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activities to explicitly invoke confirmation and compensation of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> é usado pelo <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> atividades para invocar explicitamente a confirmação e compensação de uma <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> can be composed in a nested hierarchical fashion in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> pode ser composto de uma maneira hierárquica aninhada no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Compensation Programming Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Modelo de programação de compensação](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade que é agendada quando o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" /> é executado.

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: A atividade que é agendado quando o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" /> executa.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade que é agendada quando a atividade é cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.
trans-unit.target: A atividade agendada quando a atividade é cancelada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.CancellationHandler%2A> can be used to specify custom cancelation logic for the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.CancellationHandler%2A> pode ser usado para especificar a lógica de cancelamento personalizada para o <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> do <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when compensation is performed on the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade agendada quando compensação é realizada no <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when compensation is performed on the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: A atividade agendada quando compensação é executada no <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.CompensationHandler%2A> can be used to specify custom compensation logic for the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.CompensationHandler%2A> pode ser usado para especificar a lógica de compensação personalizado para o <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> do <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when confirmation is performed for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade agendada quando confirmação é realizada para este <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when confirmation is performed for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: A atividade agendada quando a confirmação é executada para este <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.ConfirmationHandler%2A> can be used to specify custom confirmation logic for the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.ConfirmationHandler%2A> pode ser usado para especificar a lógica de confirmação personalizado para o <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> do <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.WorkflowModel.Variable" /> objects for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.WorkflowModel.Variable" /> deste <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.WorkflowModel.Variable" /> objects for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.WorkflowModel.Variable" /> deste <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
